thread.section_title: Panda Security opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Panda Security | www.pandasecurity.com
thread.title: Kevin

author: Kevin
title: Kevin
text:
I have been with Panda Security now for many years and have so far never had a virus on any of my 3 previous PCs since purchasing my first Panda Antivirus Software unlike many of my friends who have had plenty of Headaches and worry with other brands on the Market most of them use free versions a few choose other ones which turn out to be more complex and slow down PC performance.
But for me you get what you pay for and Panda have fantastic Safe guards in place on there software and you get the benefits of being well protected without slow down in Performance of your PC.
I cant ever see a time when I would go elsewhere and Recommend others to choose Panda Security
